thomsol: I only download RAR-files because its hard for anti-pirategroup to se what you actually download. Of course its hard to trace stuffs via. torrents, but your internet-supplier can still check what you download ect. Its quite easy for them to search all downloads with .avi at the end ;) anyway, if you think your supplier will never report you to the police, then you got no problem. 

Anywayz, thanks for the upload skuggan.

Its a scene release.. the way the group who recorded the show released it.. a couple of years ago it was really helpful (when connections were slower) but nowadays its kinda useless... but i'll continue upload rared shit untli the scene changes the "rules"...

Thx for the comments tho, means alot.
thomsol: i forgot... the rar in this case has never been about saving space.. read http://whyrar.omfg.se/index_eng.php for more info regarding that.

I totally agree with you, and im so sorry for the harsh words.. i got kinda carried away.

At the time of uploading i had no knowledge of this release not working on some standalone players, and since i have dualmonitors connected to my cpu i never burn stuff.

Byt since i learned about this i just had to try, and this release did in fact play without any errors on my sony player.. But im fully aware of this not working with some other ones.

So if they decide to continue ripping, lets hope they learn how to do it propoerly so everyone can enjoy it!
